text: (CdLS) vary widely among affected people and can range from relatively mild to severe. Affected people may experience: Slowed growth before and after birth Intellectual disability Developmental delay Autistic and/or self-destructive behaviors Skeletal abnormalities of the arms and hands Gastrointestinal problems Hirsutism (excess hair growth) Hearing loss Myopia Congenital heart defects Genital abnormalities (i.e. cryptorchidism) Seizures Affected people typically have distinctive craniofacial f
